ValidationRule.description: Requires a completed Content Studio project to have the "Topic" field populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Id = "0125Y000001bPG9" /*Project - Content Studio*/ && OR( ISBLANK(Completion_Date__c), Completion_Date__c >= DATEVALUE( "2018-01-01" ) ) && (Project_Status_Display__c = "Product Delivered") && ISNULL(Topic__c ) && Product_Group__c <>"Custom" && Product_Group__c <> "Demand Gen"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter a Topic for this completed project.
